Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that the #Skull Mask# yields #a Wallet#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #frogs in a storm# gift #a Wallet#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that #Dodongo's Cavern# is on the path to #King Dodongo#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that the final reward from the #Frogs of Zora's River# is #a Recovery Heart#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# teaches #the Song of Time#.
